name: Down and down we go
description:
Hi! I hadn't used Unity in quite a while and wanted to use this opportunity to get back into this program.

I had a hard time doing the most basic things and ended up creating a short meme-like experience inspired by narrative meta-games like stanley parable.

Hope it'll get a chuckle or two out of you ;)

PS: SOUND & FULLSCREEN PLEASE (also, I didn't really try the cursor lock thing, sorry, it's not super important don't worry).
